name: Hotel de la Plage

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for one night on our way back up from Spain.
reviews.title: Great hotel, fantastic location, wonderful welcome

likes.disliked: — Nothing- but then we were lucky enough to get a garage space-parking could pose problems otherwise

reviews.text: The location is fantastic- right on the beach and bang in the centre of the town, yet with very little traffic coming past, thanks to the street system.
reviews.title: To Avoid

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bright , seemingly recently refurbished room ( a junior suite with balcony) was more than spacious enough to accomodate the 4 of us ( 2 adults + 2 children) , and was impeccable, including the bathroom. Although the room was advertised as not facing the sea, there was in fact a beach view from the balcony.
reviews.title: Good friendly hotel with a great view!

description: Your room in front of the oceanIn the heart of the historic center of St jean de luz... The hotel de la plage, an exceptional situation in Saint Jean de Luz, close to the old harbour and the beaches of fine sand. At A few steps from the hotel, the lovers can stroll in the old quarters of Saint Jean de Luz and admire on their way the fish market. Gourmets will find on-site or in the neighbouring several restaurants.
